metadata.synopsis: A group of adventurers reconvene after spreading around in Wyrm's Crossing to buy supplies. They are in a rush to leave for neverwinter before the absolute arrives. This is the Gnome one liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -16; 51; -52- Talk to the gnome of the adventurer group.

0.speaker: Yonks
0.text: If you are in the market for potions, I highly recommend The Velveteen Elixir. I've not been this well-stocked since Waterdeep.
0.context: NodeContext: very much sounds like he's trying to convince himself to be enthusiastic about leaving

1.speaker: Yonks
1.text: I wish I could have spent more time perusing the shops - but alas, it is time to move on. Such is the life of a daring adventurer!
1.context: NodeContext: very much sounds like he's trying to convince himself to be enthusiastic about leaving
